name: kv-logger
description: a lightweight logger tool for k-v style log

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && rollup lib/index.js --file lib/bundle.js --format cjs
scripts.release: npm run build && standard-version --releaseCommitMessageFormat 'chore(release): {{currentTag}}' && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish

author: Roc
